about_the_game:
This is a unique card battle idle game that we have crafted together with our players. We have developed an in-depth progression system and comprehensive character and monster profiles. Moreover, we are eager to collaborate with our community to design and shape the game's future, ensuring an experience that is both rich and captivating.

Co-creation Philosophy:

We believe that the imagination and creativity of our players are the greatest drivers of the game's evolution. Therefore, we pledge to invest 100% of the revenue generated from the game back into its ongoing development and refinement, meeting and exceeding the expectations of our players.

Combat System:

Currently, the game features a card-based combat system, but our ambitions go beyond that. We plan to work alongside our players to gradually transform the combat into full 3D dynamic battles, making each encounter more realistic and thrilling.

Character Settings:

In the game, you will come across hundreds of dark goddesses, each sexy and challenging, with their own unique abilities and backstories. As an emissary of the goddess of light, you will engage in an epic confrontation with them.

Your Mission:

Utilize your goddess of light, unleash her powers, and take on the goddesses tainted by darkness. Every battle is an opportunity for growth, and every victory brings us closer to our shared goal.

Join Us:

We invite you to join "Dark Goddess of Destruction" and be a part of making history with us. This is more than just a game; it's a community, a narrative, a saga. Together, let's illuminate this world shrouded in darkness.

content_descriptors.notes: Game contains partial nudity and suggestive themes.

name: Dark Goddess of Destruction: Idle

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win7(32bit)
  • Processor: CPU Intel(R) P4 2.0G
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9400 GT
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win10(64bit),Win7(64bit)
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3-7100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 240
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: This is a unique card battle idle game that we have crafted together with our players. We have developed an in-depth progression system and comprehensive character and monster profiles.
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, Portuguese - Brazil*, German*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Russian*
*languages with full audio support
